typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		timeperiod as string,
		flow1 as integer,
		occupancy1 as double,
		speed1 as double,
		flow2 as integer,
		occupancy2 as double,
		speed2 as double,
		flow3 as integer,
		occupancy3 as double,
		speed3 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcTraffic
